description.raw:
Re-enbled saving of ogre terrain tile data to disk in the `~/.gazebo/paging` directory. The benefit is more evident with large heightmaps. The first time a large heightmap is loaded, it'll take longer for gazebo to launch due to the additional step of writing data to disk. Subsequent launches should be faster as ogre would no longer need to generate the tiles again.

[Here](https://www.dropbox.com/s/0b6uqlr6s3yjvv7/red_dem.zip?dl=0) is a large dem heightmap to test with. From local testing: 

First run:
~~~
[Msg] Heightmap loaded. Process took: 5.39788 seconds
[Msg] Saving heightmap cache data to /home/ian/.gazebo/paging/dem
[Msg] Heightmap cache data saved. Process took: 7.12726 seconds.
~~~

Second run:
~~~
[Msg] Heightmap loaded. Process took: 1.62002 seconds
~~~

jenkins:

[xenial-nvidia](http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/main/view/CI%20any%20jobs/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-xenial-amd64-gpu-nvidia/69/) - ok

[abi](http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/main/view/gazebo/job/gazebo-abichecker-any_to_any-xenial-amd64/243/API_ABI_report/) - ok

jenkins:

xenial-nvidia - ok

abi - ok
